title: Deals: Google Nest Hub 2nd Gen bundles $80 off, Samsung Frame 4K AirPlay 2 TV lows, more
content:
All of today’s best deals are now up for the taking with Google Nest Hub 2nd Gen bundles leading the way. That’s alongside all-time lows on Samsung Frame 4K AirPlay 2 TVs and the 9to5 favorite Anker Soundcore Liberty 3 Pro ANC Earbuds. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…
